website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable enough to wear all day, with an attractive watch face. Good for daily use if you want a casual look.
pros: Owners appreciate the value this watch provides
Contains most of the basic features you'll want in a sport watch, and the features are extremely easy to use
cons: Some complaints that display numbers are tough to read
Watch face is a little larger than expected

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Who can beat a watch that is reliable, easy to work, and as cheap as it is. I work 12 hour shifts during the night in a hospital. This watch has taken quite a beating, it’s lasted through pretty much anything. I’ve gotten it wet on multiple accounts (by accident) it is still works great! I love the little light it has, because sometimes I may not be in adequate lighting. This is definitely a watch you will want if you are a nurse, someone in the medical field, or someone who just wants a reliable watch!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Upside down face plate
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this watch it's stylish the functionality is great and it's very durable and comfortable. Sporty and good looking and not super small like most womens watches but no large like a men's the perfect amount. However, I took away two stars because the face plate is on backwards, or upside down.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Form and function for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday so I have no idea how it's going to hold up over time. But I must say that it is adorable! The functions seem pretty easy to use although I'll probably never test them out. I really appreciate the light function though. I'll definitely use that. Mostly I just wanted a watch to wear when I'm working out or running that I can easily read the time on. This fits the bill and looks really cute at the same time. Winner winner, chicken dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Burn!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her 11th Birthday. After a few weeks of wearing it she go sweaty one day and a perfectly round burn circle that matches the back of the watch appeared on her wrist. I don't know what metal the back of the watch is made of, but it and her sweat caused a chemical burn! Stay away from this watch and Armitron as far as I'm concerned! Next time I'll get her another Timex like she's had before (
customer_reviews.author: AVputer Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Super price on it, it's so comfortable - I haven't taken it off once since I got it. Been wearing it in the shower and pool with no problems, which is exactly why I got it. It even came with the correct date and time already set. Love it. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, and I own 3 others by Armitron! They are a great bargain, hold up well over time, and handle water exposure as advertised! I wear one of them at all times, usually even in the shower and swimming, and all of them have held up perfectly (my oldest one is over a year old.)
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I love this watch. My favorite part is the numbers are what light up instead of the background lighting up like most watches. I have very small wrists and this watch fits great with 2 extra holes if I need to tighten it. It was very easy to set the time and date and the instructions are very easy to follow if you need to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Alii

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice. I like it a lot. I was looking for an affordable watch that's water resistant, includes date and time, timer, and a light. And this watch has all of these. It even has an alarm although I haven't used that feature yet. The only negative I can say is that the light is not very bright so it's not always easy to read, but its comfortable to wear, fits nicely on my wrist, and has great features.
customer_reviews.author: Nu-bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Runs well, but wrist band is awful.
customer_reviews.text: I've had many spot watches with plastic arm bands and eventually the band breaks. Usually I get good use from these watches, but the wrist band didn't last long and there is no way to replace the band.
customer_reviews.author: NatureLoverCD

customer_reviews.title: Would be good water park watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought two waterproof watches for my boyfriend and myself to go to a water park. I didn't think bringing our phones would be a good idea (was worried about losing them or being damaged) but I wanted to be able to tell the time while we're there. My boyfriends watch helded up nicely on all of the rides, even when it was submerged underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I had this same watch for years. I was surprised they still had it. It worked great for many years and I love the alarms at work. I had gotten compliments for years on the old one and will probably get them on this one too. I like the colors wear well and it can be washed. Hope this one last as long as the old one. Good price!
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth 30.. I've bought the 10 dollar male models from walmart years ago and fooled myself into thinking this would be a slightly better gift to find that the faceplate gets scratched too easily.. Deep gouges making the time illegible. The batteries must be dead.. The light button does virtually nothing and the included direction must go to the wrong model.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Great Watches!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Armitron Sports watches!! They are comfortable and never seem to die! Seriously though, Armitron is a great company. The only drawback to the watches I've purchased in the past is that the bands wear-out before the watch dies; you can't find a replacement band so now you have to purchase a new watch.
customer_reviews.author: Maddiva

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sporty watch I could wear while working. Something durable that could withstand all the bumps and falls that come with a physically demanding job, and something water-resistant that wouldn’t get damaged if splashed while washing my hands. I tried a lot of watches before this one, but none of them were just right. This watch is exactly what I was looking for. And it’s so comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Pandora09

customer_reviews.title: The purple accent is very nice and not too bright
customer_reviews.text: The purple accent is very nice and not too bright. The watch does exactly what I need it to which is to use the stopwatch feature when I go running. I have not used it in water so I can't say if it's waterproof or not. I do not wear it as an everyday watch although it can function as one with no problem. Cute, affordable watch that gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: I have had this for years now and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for years now. It has held up well. It is hard to set since you have to hold more than one button down at a time and they are hard to keep held down. I have swam in the ocean with it. No leaking. It is easy to switch modes. I did buy this on Amazon. I just forgot to review it until now.
customer_reviews.author: FaerylochTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I use this for working at a daycare. Helps me to quickly see what time it is. The watch fits well on my thin wrists and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust settings
customer_reviews.text: I have showered with this on many times and it functions perfectly, the last one I owned lasted 3 years before the band turned cracked and ugly. the clock still functioned perfectly but the watch was so dirty and ugly looking that my husband insisted I get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's really been a great asset as the time and seconds are very visible
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this watch for several weeks on the job as a nurse. It's really been a great asset as the time and seconds are very visible. It's also super convenient to have the date displayed. The band is comfortable but the clasp can get irritating to my skin after many rounds of charting so I just loosen it or put it over my sleeve. It has survived many, many hand washings so I trust that it is waterproof as it says.
customer_reviews.author: Bic

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price $
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for the price. I gave it a five star because of the price etc... but this is the second one I have bought. Even though I didn’t wear it every day after a few years the band started to come apart. I will and do still recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: sharon m hoffler

customer_reviews.title: best watch ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i have always loved this watch! i had it in 3rd grade through 5th grade and just got a new one in 7th grade. i find it so easy and simple. you can use timer, stopwatch, and alarm, and it also tells the hour, minute, second, AND the date!!! i’m obsessed with this watch and it’s great for long days swimming at the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Minyoung Sohn

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Broken band after 40 days. At first I loved this watch - purchased for my 11 year old daughter who likes bigger watch bands. R Easy to set & she loved the color. We received the watch Aug 18th and the plastic part where the band meets the actual watch broke on Sep 26. We can pay $10 to ship it for repair but that hardly seems worth it. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: denverhalestorm

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged :(
customer_reviews.text: My young son loves this watch. It’s his favorite color and just the right size. I took off a star because it arrived with a chip in the color and the plastic wrap 1/2 off. Since it arrived that way, I question how durable it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Great watch! I used this watch for field work
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! I used this watch for field work, and part of my job was to wash things in a bleach mixture nearly every day 6-7 days in a row. I wore my watch every day, and submerged it at least 2 feet in water many times. It's still working perfectly fine 8 months later, the plastic is a little de-colored from the bleach, but otherwise in very good condition. The strap is a good thickness (not too thick, but thick enough to make it durable).
customer_reviews.author: Kookykat

customer_reviews.title: water watch
customer_reviews.text: I swim practically every day and I go to Maui twice a year for a month each time to snorkel in the ocean. I love the way this watch looks and fits. I have an older one and wanted to make sure I had a backup because I wear it all the time. I like that I don't have to be concerned about it getting wet unlike my gold watch. This one is so practical for my everyday watch.
customer_reviews.author: SandCastle

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Manage
customer_reviews.text: I switched from the Timex IronMan Sleek watch because of the price difference. This watch does possess a lot of different functionalities. However, utilizing those is extremely non-intuitive. I have to repeatedly consult the instruction page. I find that setting this watch rivals bilingual medical school in difficulty! Well, almost. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Rider

customer_reviews.title: Great boy's watch
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old loves this watch. He regularly uses the stopwatch, the timer & the alarm. I bought the first one over a year ago and he took a bad fall and smashed it. He looked at lots of watches, but requested the same exact one. I thought oh I'm sure they don't make the same exact watch anymore, and fortunately Amazon had it! In the summer he swam with it all the time. Which was great because if he had to take it off he would have lost it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Bipidty

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for price
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for price. I have had this watch for a while now and it doesn't come off my wrist. I shower and wash up and numerous other water activities and it hasn't had a problem. It's comfortable to wear and easy enough to operate. The instructions included are good. It is starting to show a little bit of wear with the colour coming off on some of the colour pieces at the side of the watch face, but nothing too obvious and it doesn't bother me as this isn't a watch I've paid hundreds for. The watch came on time and packaged well. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Issy

customer_reviews.title: It is a pretty sport watch for my girl who is a fan ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty sport watch for my girl who is a fan of all purple stuff. The only complaint is that there is no instruction guide on the functions and features of the watch included in the box. Perfect for young girl and teenagers or women who have small waists who prefer a smaller watch.
customer_reviews.author: Purplerose

customer_reviews.title: The purple color on the band is deep pretty purple. The instructions were easy to understand took ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my teen daughter. Her wrist is small and this watch fits perfectly. The purple color on the band is deep pretty purple. The instructions were easy to understand took less than 5 minutes to set time and alarm and adjust wrist strap.
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is amazing! I wanted something simple and easy to read for when I can't have my phone, and this fits the bill! The strap is comfortable and is easily adjustable, and the face of the watch itself is beautiful and very easy to read! Setting it up was simple and it comes with easy to read instructions! It is water proof, and I took a shower with it on, no damages or anything! Very sturdy watch, and I highly recommend it! 10/10 would buy again, not only this watch, but from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny R.

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, waterproof, comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: This little watch have all the basic features you may need. The build is good ,it's waterproof, comfortable to wear, and the price is good. The cons is the button, there are four buttons but only one is use to change the value, in short you may only go forward / increment the value. Summary 5/5 Cant beat the price for what it can offer.
customer_reviews.author: Raphy

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great .
customer_reviews.text: The band looks good, however it is not as comfortable as previous watches from this company. Also, the LED light up is not as bright and quickly fades away. For the price it will be fine for now.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: So....I work as a nurse in an Emergency Department and this watch is great. I love that the date is on it since I can never remember what day it is, the color is great since pink is my favorite color. Perfect for any nurses out there! Stopwatch and timer comes in handy too!
customer_reviews.author: Twister23

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! This is basically part of me now
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! This is basically part of me now. Do EVERYTHING with it, including competitive swimming. Has held up for about a year. When the screen scratches like they all do, you can wipe it down with an alcohol swab. It must corrode it or something because it looks like new after! (Might not want to do that too frequently).
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof watch!
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for a cruise since we would be out on excursions and swimming in the ocean. The watched worked great, I just made sure to rinse it off with fresh water after swimming in the ocean so the salt water residue would not corrode it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love everything about this watch. Very easy to operate and it looks great. My only issue is that it came with a small scratch on the center of the face, right where the time is displayed.
customer_reviews.author: S R

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my 11 year daughter a couple of months ago. She loves it, it is durable, works just as described, and looks very nice on her small wrist. The shipping was fast and I feel like the price was appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: NelsonAltamirano

customer_reviews.title: Wife is using as a scuba watch. Holding well so far
customer_reviews.text: My wife is using this as a scuba watch. 5 dives now and it’s still going strong. Haven’t went any lower than 45ft yet. I Don’t expect it to last forever scubaing in saltwater, but it’s holding up alright so far. Can see it good underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mccrary

customer_reviews.title: A Great Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for work. I love the colors on the watch. It works great!! I like the military time feature which is what I use at work. This watch does the job!! I didn't even pay a fortune for it either!! I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Neesie24

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: As far as the watch runs, it functions properly. I only gave it 4 stars because it was not easy to set. (I had to get a friend to do it, and he said he set it by accident and couldn't tell me how he did it.) I wish the band was more breathable. My wrist sweats a lot under the band.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bigby

customer_reviews.title: Good watch for all needs!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is comfortable, a great quick reference for the info I need as a teacher daily, and i have peace of mind knowing it can handle a little water splash, as I wash my hands hundreds of times a day in the Preschool classroom! I love it! ❤️😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I am a Chef and my hands are always covered in random stuff. I wash this with soap and water every day and it still works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: racheal

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be easy - if nothing else - to set the time
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the reviews, I thought this would be easy - if nothing else - to set the time. WRONG. Also - the alarm now goes off at 3 am and nobody can figure out how to turn it off! The instructions are in font 2 so good luck reading them. It is not comfortable too - the plastic pulls at your skin. So - although it looks good, and has great reviews - I have not had the same experience -
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I almost never take this thing off and it's held up very well. After months of near constant usage, the screen isn't scratched, all the buttons still work (the light feature is so useful), and the band looks the same as when I bought it (no discoloration like my last watch). The only sad part is any of the purple around the watch face has rubbed off and is now white.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: I am very fond of any kind ofwatch, but this particular one is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I am very fond of any kind of watch, but this particular one is my favorite. My watch collection has grown but 'Mz Purple" is the winner. It fits like a glove around my small wrist and I hardly know I'm wearing it. Excellent price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Not so great...
customer_reviews.text: Got my watch today and I love it. It's super comfy and the date/day/time are all easy to read. I really like how the light works. Definitely worth it. Edit one month later: the adj button has fallen off. was nice for the month it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Zarabeth Langer

customer_reviews.title: not worth it  difficult to set, read and see time.
customer_reviews.text: this is very difficult to set and change the time. arrived with proper time but since daylight savings time it is impossible to get correct time set. also very difficult to read and the light isn't very bright for early morning work outs. ready to toss it in trash.
customer_reviews.author: J. Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read...
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Everything is very easy to see and read. Really like the fact that the buttons don't stick out and get bumped. Very pretty shade of purple...looks good with the stainless steel and black. Comfortable to wear too.
customer_reviews.author: Mday

customer_reviews.title: For the runner
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is on a track team so she needed a watch to time her runs and splits. Definitely a good watch for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Diorio

customer_reviews.title: Goes completely blank in the sunshine
customer_reviews.text: This is normally an excellent brand. Every time this watch is in the sunshine, the screen goes completely bank. It will work again after I bring it inside, but I have to re-set the time. I have repeatedly (so many times!) tried to use this watch outside. It's useless though. Very disappointed with this product. I do not recommend it at all. It is not a battery issue. It is a heat issue.
customer_reviews.author: Adam T. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Feeling defeated by defective products!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because I needed one for work and the last watch I bought through amazon the battery was dead within 2 month. This watch lasted till July and the strap on it broke which can not be replaced or I would just buy a new strap for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go to watch
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this watch for the third time. I wear it everyday and one watch lasts me about two years. I love it. I like that it tells me the day and date without having to push any buttons. The size is perfect for me too. The backlight is not too bright when turned on during the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Lasted me over 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in 2014 for wearing at work. I worked as a server and needed something that was waterproof with visible time. It worked out great. Orange color is a bit much but I liked it. Pretty gender neutral which I also liked.
customer_reviews.author: justagirl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to read!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to the ocean. Great that you can go straight into water. Easy to read, even in bright sunshine.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Klarer

customer_reviews.title: I never take this off!
customer_reviews.text: Waited to write my review to see how it held up. I never take this watch off. Been swimming with it, totally fine. Band is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. UPDATE: LASTED 3 YEARS
customer_reviews.text: I wear this watch every where. I bought it because it is water resistant and pretty cute. It also doesn't feel cheap like other watches I've had. I love this watch. UPDATE: 3 YEARS later, it still works perfectly! I've worn it almost everyday for the past 3 years, and I just broke the strap and need a new one. Watch still works fine. If I didn't break the strap, I would still be using it. Definitely buying this watch again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: awesome value
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a great value. The color is gorgeous, the price is affordable, and the buttons/menus are easily learned and executable. I use this watch every day to time my experiments. It rules. Now I can do a thousand things at once without forgetting about my experiment, because the timer is attached to my body. The watch face isn't very tough, which is not unexpected for the price. I scuffed it against a wall, but was able to polish it back to new using a cue tip and tooth paste (arm and hammer). Good as new!
customer_reviews.author: E. Webber

customer_reviews.title: hard to read--glare and shaded numbers
customer_reviews.text: The watch may function great, but I couldn't handle the strain on my eyes to see the numbers. I've never had a watch with such a glare. And the shaded time adds to the difficulty, though it doesn't look too bad in the picture. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: The water resistance is fabulous.  I use it daily diving in pools.
customer_reviews.text: An inexpensive but solid and useful watch. Holds up very well. One of the best watches I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: alcibiades

customer_reviews.title: Really good, comfortable, tells the time
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks really good - it looks sporty but not cheap. There are lots of modes and options, including 24hr clock. There is a light button which helps me because I work in the dark
customer_reviews.author: Yuliana

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived promptly a few days after I placed my order. It is exactly what I was looking for, a little smaller than I thought it would be which is perfect. It fits well and is very comfortable. It has all the features I was looking for-- dual times, stopwatch and countdown timer, alarm, calendar, and a backlight that seems to work well. It came with decent instructions and is easy to use and program. I will be testing it underwater during marine snorkeling research soon, hopefully it will perform well. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MumblerK

customer_reviews.title: She loves the watch.
customer_reviews.text: Working well out of the box. Hope it lasts longer than the brand we bought previously.
customer_reviews.author: A Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a very good quality product. Very nice features. Bought it for a Christmas present for my teenager nephew and she was very delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Olavarria

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears this watch every day, and loves it! She’s worn it while swimming and showering, and has had no problems. It’s the perfect size for her! (She’s 10.)
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Not one word of documentation comes with this watch. Unless you already know how to set it or don't mind having to do the research, think again before buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Korona

customer_reviews.title: not so good as it is said
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this watch. She wears it when swimming because I told her it's water proof. But, it's not. She said at the beginning, after swimming, the watch became foggy but would be fine the second day; but a month ago she showed me two days after swimming that the watch was still foggy. It's not as good as ad says. Just a normal watch.
customer_reviews.author: DENGJUN WEI

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the overall price of this watch, it is definitely acceptable and seems to be a better quality than the Timex Ironman that I had to start replacing every six months. It takes a bit to get used to programming the settings and my biggest complaint is it doesn't keep the last time on the timer and you can't reset the timer. You always have to reprogram the timer.
customer_reviews.author: Letra

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love my new watch, I have always been a faithful Ironman watch wearer, but lately the quality has been terrible and I have wasted too much money on them. I ordered this watch for the low price and I was really surprised at the quality. I was easy to set, love how the numbers light up in the dark when you want to see the time, and the pink against the black just POPS! I get a lot of compliments on it and I am thinking of getting a second one to give my niece as a gift. All I can really say is I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Andres

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I am a mother of three. One of which is in the scouts so that means a lot of out door time lol I had my first watch for about 2 years! It works great in all kinds of weather, I wore it every day until the band fell apart so I repurchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Wade Owens

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I swim, take a shower, and workout with this all the time and it still works. It also looks nice. I can read the numbers at any time.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I definitely enjoy the color scheme and the display is different but ...
customer_reviews.text: I definitely enjoy the color scheme and the display is different but still legible. The purpose of this watch is for the gym and it doesn't bug me like this other watch where it was too big. It's not super light but it seems pretty durable. I like how there's a little latch knob at the end of the strap so when you stick it through the loop to secure it, the loop doesn't slide around but against it to keep the end of the strap from sticking out.
customer_reviews.author: TuxedoSam

customer_reviews.title: /Face scratches easily, hard to see in the dark
customer_reviews.text: My main disappointment after having it a month is the face is easily scratchable and the night light to read it in the dark is inadequate for me to see it. Relatively easy to set up, love the color, size, etc. Band is flexible and not too annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Horse Lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! Settings were a little confusing, but figured them out over time and practice. Color does fade over time if item is worn or used underwater.
customer_reviews.author: IM4ND

customer_reviews.title: FUN & RELIABLE SPORT WATCH
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It performs well and I love the "pop" of bright pink color. It is easy to read, has worked reliably (as have all of my Armitron watches) and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JewelLuvr

customer_reviews.title: Good watch for swimming
customer_reviews.text: This watch satisfied my need for a waterproof watch to wear for swimming and hot tubing. The face is easy to read and it is small enough to not overpower my small hands. I was not sure of the watch strap length, but with a 7" wrist, there were at least 2 or 3 additional holes in the band, should you need a larger band. I haven't tried it under water but expect it will be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie. Rider

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these watches but they break after a year or teo if you constantly wet them like me. I dont take mine off. Ever. I should it also give me a rash on my wrist sometimes. But still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Functional and easy to read!! I have bad eyes so I liked the size of the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Best watch I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how affordable this amazing watch is. I've had it underwater for hours and it works great. It is super comfortable and seems very durable. I recommend this watch to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome watch and for such a great price. Easy to set up and easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Hamton

customer_reviews.title: The watch is pretty and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: The watch is pretty and seems durable, and the price was great. But I cannot figure out how to set the military time option, which is why I purchased this watch in the first place. It comes with instructions, but when you press the buttons that it says- the options for 12 or 24 are not coming up for me.
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job dobe
customer_reviews.text: The watch is exactly what I was looking for and I really do like it; however the first digit looks wonky. For example, the 1 in 10 is broken. It’s not that big of an issue. I might just be picky. Otherwise, the watch fits well and tells time. It comes with a manual that was helpful for setting the time.
customer_reviews.author: Diona Gordon

customer_reviews.title: It's just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: As a college student I wanted a casual/sporty watch that I could also use at my swimming classes. This watch does the trick and isn't as big as other similar watches. The only extra note is that it's screen isn't too scratch resistant, it'll survive but if you're too clumsy with it, you'll have scratches all over the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Clau

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The watch does not allow me to do the main thing I bought it for...which is to keep using programmed counter timer. Each time I need to use 2 minute timer, I have to keep on programming it again. There's no easy way to program it ones and keep using that setting. The back light is also not that bright. The design is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: ... for my boyfriends 10 yr old niece and she LOVED it! It came on time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriends 10 yr old niece and she LOVED it! It came on time, packaged nicely, and the purple color was nice and vibrant. She had asked for a purple watch for Christmas but every purple watch I found looked to young for her and I wanted something that had purple in it but that she could wear as she gets older. This watch was simply perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH
customer_reviews.text: NOTHING SPECTACULAR. WATCH IS EXACTLY WHAT IS LISTED. MY DAUGHTER LOVES IT SO IM HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia and William Pack

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown, perfect purple :)
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted a purple watch for Christmas, you should've seen her face, it was awesome!!! The watch is still working fine and she's very very happy and so am I. great price, shipped fast,what more can I say, OK, one more thing Amazon is great, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Veriferd purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: But it was hard to set the time like all of them are, I had to have my husband do it. I love the color and have worn it in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: K9smiles

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable and durable!
customer_reviews.text: My watch continues to work flawless. I love the little rubber bumper guards to help prevent screen damage.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Stylish. Could be a little more flexible for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It's a really nice watch and has great features
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. It's a really nice watch and has great features. I would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Day

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying this watch. Its cute, I bought it to wear to work. Easy to understand the instructions to change time, but have tried any of the other functions.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: In love with this watch. Will purchase another one in different color.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this watch. I bought it for the purpose of nursing school and I don't think it will disappoint. It has military time and the light shows the time beautifully for those moments when I may be in a patients room. I did a lot of research on which watch to get. Even though some may say it doesn't matter but I prefer the accuracy of the digital time view and product itself in terms of color and size fits exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with this watch so far. It arrived on time and was exactly what I expected to it to be. There is a learning curve with the timer and alarm, but it’s still pretty easy to learn. So far, I’m very glad I close the watch I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I would give this watch 4 stars for doing exactly what I want it to do (keeping time, being pink). However, it gets 5 stars for arriving set to the proper date and time. I love that it lights up as well. I've used the stopwatch and that works great, I haven't used any of the extra fancy features but as everything immediately important is fine I assume they would be too. Durable and definitely waterproof so far (2 weeks in, and I'm not easy on my possessions). For $22, you get a lot I think. I would expect to pay a lot more than that for a watch as nice as this one seems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Armitron ladies watch
customer_reviews.text: This is third I've had like this. The other two still work. I love it's got two different time zones. I have a cell phone with the time on it. But I'm a watch person. Just look at my wrist instead of pulling a phone out of my pocket or purse. The price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: satisfied with this watch and I m pretty hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: satisfied with this watch and I m pretty hard to please with watches. it is light weight and had enough features for me, for a watch I don't wear everyday. it was inexpensive but have no problem with the quality of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Crays

customer_reviews.title: I got this at a great price! It is also really eye catching
customer_reviews.text: I got this at a great price! It is also really eye catching. I use mine for taking animal pulses and respiraton. Having the the seconds easy to view makes it so handy.
customer_reviews.author: ElegantDisaster

customer_reviews.title: Armitron Women's Watch
customer_reviews.text: After years of replacing Timex Ironman watches because none of them would keep water out we decided to try the Armitron. After swiming with it in the ocean, pools, and hot tubs it has not had any problems. The only issue that we have seen with the watch is that the mode button after just 2 months of use, looks like it has been used for years. All the paint that covers the button has worn off. Functionally the watch has been solid.
customer_reviews.author: EMor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this watch. She hasnt taken it off since she opened it as a gift. The band is comfortable, time is easy to see, and easy to set.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Norris
